Posts.Content: Jul 5, 2016 06:34PM laure999 wrote: Hair came in roughly five weeks after halting perjeta and taxotere. Still on Herceptin, neupogen and zometa. I was a red head until chemo -- diagnosed stage four last July -- now I have gorgeous short silver punk. Never lost the eye lashes nor eyebrows.
